subtitle.translate: Useful for Multiplayer in many ways!

description: /4/Rubies/4/ are a particularly crucial material for Inquisitive's server. They can be used to craft anything from trading stations to heart crystals!
> Ruby Shards can be combined with many materials to create heart crystals and containers.
- Heart Crystals persist like a longer absorption heart, regenerateable until you die.
- Heart Containers are permanent, and can be made without rubies to store hearts.
> Rubies can also be crafted into Trade Stations and cards, which store your rubies as a convenient form of currency, with some limitations;
- Trade Stations can only sell one item at a time
> Heartstones, crafted in sets of two, will let you link with another.
> It comes in pairs, and allows the player to seek out another player to whom they've given the second stone.
> Right-clicking the stone sends a particle trail in the direction of the player.
> Getting closer to the target player will also make them glow pink, allowing you to easily spot them.
